subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrick Marleau scored his second goal with 4 minutes 21 seconds left, and the Sharks grabbed a berth in their third consecutive Western Conference semifinals, beating Nashville, 3-2, Friday night.
snippet: Patrick Marleau scored his second goal with 4 minutes 21 seconds left, and the Sharks grabbed a berth in their third consecutive Western Conference semifinals, beating Nashville, 3-2, Friday night.
